gjs-html:
Hurry! your coupon expires soon!

Use your 10% off coupon before it expires on {{retainful_coupon_expiry_date}}
{{retainful_coupon}}
SHOP NOW!

Please do not hesitate to get in contact if you have any questions.

Best,
Team Your Shop Name

@ {{shop.name}} | {{shop.address}}

If you have any questions, please feel free to reach out to us.

If you don't want to receive any future emails  unsubscribe here

gjs-css: * { box-sizing: border-box; } body {margin: 0;}#ivk9{name:Lato;href:https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Lato:400,700;id:ivk9;}#ingj{name:Oswald;href:https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Oswald:500,600,700;id:ingj;}#iq561w{padding-bottom:20px;id:iq561w;background-color:#fff;border-top:1px solid #e5e5e5;border-right:1px solid #e5e5e5;border-left:1px solid #e5e5e5;}#iei4j{src:https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/retainful/emailCustomizer@0.1.9/images/your-logo.png;id:iei4j;width:100%;}#ii1oeh{background-color:#fef2f0;id:ii1oeh;padding-bottom:6%;padding-top:6%;border-top:3px none #ffce3d;border-right:1px solid #e5e5e5;border-left:1px solid #e5e5e5;}#ijvr12-2{border-radius:1px 0 0 0;id:ijvr12-2;}#i4fb{src:https://s3.us-east-2.amazonaws.com/retainful-public/assets/images/240bdab30186a168f0018ef967391aa4/b46a11c6-dfdf-4c78-bc31-067588b2dee9f203e264b7a10bf16a8d80ad6779c384.jpg;id:i4fb;toggleimagemodal:https://s3.us-east-2.amazonaws.com/retainful-public/assets/images/240bdab30186a168f0018ef967391aa4/b46a11c6-dfdf-4c78-bc31-067588b2dee9f203e264b7a10bf16a8d80ad6779c384.jpg;container-background-color:none;width:272px;}#ii1oeh-2{background-color:#FFFFFF;id:ii1oeh-2;padding-bottom:0px;padding-top:0;border-right:1px solid #e5e5e5;border-left:1px solid #e5e5e5;}#iz5l57{background-color:#FFF;border-right:1px solid #e5e5e5;border-left:1px solid #e5e5e5;id:iz5l57;padding-top:0;border-bottom:1px none rgb(0, 0, 0);padding-bottom:0;}#iooa4-2{background-color:#FFFFFF;padding-bottom:0;padding-top:0;border-right:1px solid #e5e5e5;border-left:1px solid #e5e5e5;id:iooa4-2;}#iooa4{background-color:#FFFFFF;padding-bottom:0;padding-top:0;border-right:1px solid #e5e5e5;border-left:1px solid #e5e5e5;id:iooa4;}#ibcc33{background-color:#FFFFFF;padding-bottom:0;padding-top:0;border-right:1px solid #e5e5e5;border-left:1px solid #e5e5e5;id:ibcc33;}#iq8f{padding-top:15px;background-color:#fff;id:iq8f;border-right:1px solid #e5e5e5;border-left:1px solid #e5e5e5;padding-bottom:15px;}#ivpi{padding-top:4px;padding-bottom:0;font-size:30px;line-height:40px;align:center;font-weight:700;color:#000000;font-family:Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;id:ivpi;}#iof5{font-weight:400;font-size:28px;align:center;font-family:Lato,Helvetica,sans-serif;id:iof5;padding-top:0;}#i7lpl{cr-editable:false;cr-shpy-coupon:true;coupon-block:true;font-weight:bold;font-size:20px;font-family:Lato, Helvetica, sans-serif;line-height:1.8em;align:center;padding-top:10;padding-bottom:10;id:i7lpl;color:#ff6c6b;text-decoration:underline;}#ir90o{container-background-color:none;background-color:#ff6c6b;data-cr-id:rtl_shop_now;href:{{ retainful_shop_url_with_coupon_code }};padding-top:20px;font-family:Lato, Helvetica, sans-serif;line-height:1.8;font-weight:700;font-size:14px;id:ir90o;padding-bottom:0;}#ii1oeh-6-2{background-color:#fef2f0;id:ii1oeh-6-2;padding-bottom:30px;border-bottom:1px solid #e5e5e5;border-right:1px solid #e5e5e5;border-left:1px solid #e5e5e5;font-family:Lato,Helvetica,sans-serif;}#ihsq4z{color:#333;font-size:16px;font-weight:500;line-height:1.8em;font-family:Lato, Helvetica, sans-serif;id:ihsq4z;padding-top:5px;padding-bottom:0;}#iu40gp-2{background-color:rgba(8,0,0,0.84);id:iu40gp-2;padding-top:0;border-right:0 none #e5e5e5;border-left:0 none #e5e5e5;border-bottom:0 none;}#i42ob7-2{width:100%;id:i42ob7-2;}#i8544p{color:#bbb;font-family:Open Sans, Helvetica, sans-serif;font-weight:500;line-height:1em;align:center;padding-top:0;padding-bottom:0;id:i8544p;}#outlook a{padding-top:0px;padding-right:0px;padding-bottom:0px;padding-left:0px;}.ExternalClass *{line-height:100%;}body{margin-top:0px;margin-right:0px;margin-bottom:0px;margin-left:0px;padding-top:0px;padding-right:0px;padding-bottom:0px;padding-left:0px;text-size-adjust:100%;}table, td{border-collapse:collapse;}img{border-top-color:initial;border-top-style:initial;border-top-width:0px;border-right-color:initial;border-right-style:initial;border-right-width:0px;border-bottom-color:initial;border-bottom-style:initial;border-bottom-width:0px;border-left-color:initial;border-left-style:initial;border-left-width:0px;border-image-outset:initial;border-image-repeat:initial;border-image-slice:initial;border-image-source:initial;border-image-width:initial;height:auto;line-height:100%;outline-color:initial;outline-style:none;outline-width:initial;text-decoration-line:none;text-decoration-style:initial;text-decoration-color:initial;}p{display:block;margin-top:13px;margin-right:0px;margin-bottom:13px;margin-left:0px;}
